subject: Cleansers, Detergents and Soaps
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: If not for the track fire that delayed the Daytona 500 for two hours, few would have known that Tide detergent can launder grape juice stains and a track burned by a jet fuel fire.
snippet: If not for the track fire that delayed the Daytona 500 for two hours, few would have known that Tide detergent can launder grape juice stains and a track burned by a jet fuel fire.
